name: Boids
body:
View the completed project at [http://boids.mrfornal.net](http://boids.mrfornal.net).

The purpose of this project is two-fold:

1. Teach myself JavaScript, using an algorithm I already (mostly) know.
2. Have the results be interesting, and not just a crapy "Hello, World"-ish demo.

Hopefully I will learn quite a bit along the way. Thanks for looking!
tagline: My attempt at recreating Boids using Canvas and JavaScript. This is purely for my own learning.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
